TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartConnection extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一个对象，该对象可使两个 控件形成连接。

span.span: Provides an object that enables two controls to form a connection.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件控件集，连接是链接或两个之间的关联（或其他服务器或用户） 可以共享数据的控件。In the Web Parts control set, a connection is a link or association between two (or other server or user) controls that enables them to share data. 此功能共享数据可让连接的控件以在超过由独立的控件提供的功能的方法中使用。This ability to share data allows connected controls to be used in ways that exceed the functionality offered by the isolated controls. 例如，如果一个控件提供了邮政编码数据，另一个控件可以读取该数据并提供基于邮政编码的本地天气信息，然后两个控件的连接的功能提供更多价值给用户。For example, if one control provides postal code data, and another control can read that data and provide local weather information based on the postal code, then the connected capability of the two controls provides more value to users. 若要扩展此示例中，可以创建其他控件，它还基于邮政编码，如与本地新闻的链接控件的显示信息和可以使用邮政编码数据的所有这些控件可以与提供的单个控件共享数据邮政编码。To extend this example, other controls could be created that also display information based on a postal code, such as a control with links to local news, and all these controls that can work with postal code data could share data with the single control that provides a postal code. Web 部件应用程序的最终用户可以创建和管理直接从 Web 浏览器中，使用标准连接用户界面 (UI) 提供的所有此类兼容的控件之间的连接控件，或使用提供的自定义 UI开发人员。End users of Web Parts applications can create and manage connections between all such compatible controls directly from a Web browser, using the standard connections user interface (UI) provided by the control, or using a custom UI provided by a developer. 这类概述是用于创建连接的基本详细信息的常规语句。This class overview is a general statement of the basic details for creating a connection. 有关特定组件和创建连接所涉及的要求的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件连接概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b)，或请参阅引用类和代码示例下面的讨论中所述。For more on specific components and requirements involved in creating connections, see [Web Parts Connections Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b), or see the reference classes and code examples mentioned in the following discussion. 有几个基本方面的 Web 部件连接：There are several fundamental aspects of a Web Parts connection: - 两个控件。Two controls. 每个 Web 部件连接中包含两个控件。Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls. 可以为控件同时参与多个连接但每个单个连接两个控件组成。It is possible for a control to participate in more than one connection simultaneously, but every single connection consists of exactly two controls. 控件可以直接从派生基类，也可以是其他服务器控件，包括 ASP.NET 控件、 自定义服务器控件和用户控件。The controls can derive directly from the base class, or they can be other server controls, including ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls. 无法从元素派生的控件类中，如果按放置区域，请使用自动换行对象在运行时，使他们能够继承类和函数运行时作为控件。Controls that do not derive from the class, if placed in a zone, are automatically wrapped with a object at run time, which enables them to inherit from the class and function as run-time controls. - 控件位于区域。Controls residing in zones. 这两控件和任何其他类型的服务器控件必须驻留在区域能够参与 Web 部件连接 （以及大多数其他 Web 部件功能）。Both controls and any other type of server control must reside in a zone to be able to participate in Web Parts connections (and most other Web Parts features). - 使用者和提供程序。Consumers and providers. 每个 Web 部件连接中有两个控件： 数据和数据的使用者的提供程序。In every Web Parts connection there are two controls: a provider of data and a consumer of data. 提供程序数据提供给使用者通过接口的形式返回数据的指定的回调方法。The provider furnishes data to the consumer through a specified callback method that returns data in the form of an interface. （有关如何创建和指定的回调方法的示例，请参阅本主题的示例部分）。此回调方法被称为提供者连接点。(For an example of how to create and specify the callback method, see the Example section of this topic.) This callback method is known as a provider connection point. 此连接点 （其"友好"名称、 ID 和返回的接口的类型） 的详细信息包含在与提供者控件关联的对象。The details of this connection point (its "friendly" name, an ID, and the type of the returned interface) are contained in a object associated with the provider control. 通过指定的方法可以接受接口的实例，使用者接收的数据。The consumer receives the data through a specified method that can accept an instance of the interface. 此方法称为使用者连接点，并且连接点 （名称、 ID 和类型的接口） 的详细信息包含在与使用者控件关联的对象。This method is known as a consumer connection point, and the details of the connection point (name, ID, and type of interface) are contained in a object associated with the consumer control. - 兼容的控件或有效的转换器。Compatible controls or a valid transformer. 若要运行的连接，为使用者和提供程序必须是兼容 （即其指定的连接点方法可以使用相同类型的接口） 或必须是能够转换所提供的类型的对象使用者所理解的类型到提供程序。For a connection to work, the consumer and provider must either be compatible (meaning that their specified connection point methods can work with the same type of interface), or there must be a object capable of translating the type offered by the provider into a type understood by the consumer. - 对象。A object. 连接存在，必须有的一个实例类，其中包含对提供程序和使用者控件，以及它们的连接点的详细信息的引用。For a connection to exist, there must be an instance of the class that contains references to the provider and consumer controls, along with the details of their connection points. 如果提供程序和使用者不兼容，并改为使用对象进行连接，连接引用转换器。If the provider and consumer are incompatible and instead use a object to connect, the connection references the transformer. - 建立连接的方法。A means of establishing the connection. 兼容的使用者和提供者控件具有已正确使用连接点方法设计并放置在一个区域后和对象可用，最后一个必要的基本步骤是启动连接。After compatible consumer and provider controls have been properly designed with connection point methods and placed in a zone, and a object is available, the last basic step necessary is to initiate the connection. 发生这种情况的一种方法是为用户创建通过用户界面的连接。One way this can happen is for users to create the connection through the UI. 如果将置于``元素上的网页和其他所需组件的连接是到位，请在运行时用户可以将页切换到连接显示模式，单击连接上的谓词提供程序或使用者的谓词菜单并连接用户界面 (基于控件) 将出现。If you place an `` element on the page, and the other required components for a connection are in place, at run time a user can switch the page into connect display mode, click a connect verb on the verbs menu of either the provider or consumer, and a connection UI (based on the control) will appear. 通过此 UI，用户可以发起连接。Through this UI, the user can initiate the connection. 若要启动连接的另一种方法是以编程方式执行。Another way to initiate the connection is to do it programmatically. 在任一情况下，是否通过用户界面或以编程方式，基础方法，启动的连接是相同的。In either case, whether through the UI or programmatically, the underlying method that initiates the connection is the same. 应用程序调用方法 (或方法，如果使用的转换器) 上控件，将其传递给提供程序、 使用者和其各自的连接点对象，然后该方法将返回对象。The application calls the method (or the method if using a transformer) on the control, passing to it the provider, the consumer, and their respective connection point objects, and the method returns a object. 类定义封装两个连接的重要详细信息的对象控件。The class defines an object that encapsulates the essential details of a connection between two controls. 类包含几乎完全与特定连接的详细信息相关的属性。The class consists almost entirely of properties related to the details of a particular connection. 多个属性与连接中的使用者控件。Several properties concern the consumer control in a connection. 属性引用本身的使用者控件和属性引用使用者的 id。The property references the consumer control itself, and the property references the consumer's ID. 对象，其中包含使用者的连接点的详细信息，由使用者的引用属性。The object, which contains the details of the consumer's connection point, is referenced by the consumer's property. 属性引用的 ID对象。The property references the ID of the object. 所有这些与使用者相关的连接属性必须具有值分配给他们创建的连接。All these consumer-related connection properties must have a value assigned to them to create a connection. 类还具有几个与属性，在连接提供者控件和这些使用者对应于属性。The class also has several properties that relate to the provider control in a connection, and these correspond to the properties for a consumer. 属性引用的提供者控件本身，而属性引用其 id。The property references the provider control itself, while the property references its ID. 属性引用对象，和属性引用的提供者连接点的 ID。The property references the object, and the property references the ID of the provider's connection point. 多个属性与连接的状态。Several properties concern the state of the connection. 属性指示连接是否处于活动状态 （当前交换数据） 或处于非活动状态 （仍已连接，但不是主动共享数据）。The property indicates whether the connection is active (currently exchanging data) or inactive (still connected but not actively sharing data). 属性指示连接是否已在不共享 （适用于页的所有用户） 或特定于用户的连接，并属性指示该控件是静态的 （声明在页标记中并因此是永久） 或动态 （以编程方式创建，这意味着它可以被删除）。The property indicates whether the connection is a shared (available to all users of a page) or a user-specific connection, and the property indicates whether the control is static (declared in the page markup and thus permanent) or dynamic (created programmatically, meaning that it can be deleted). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建两个之间的简单连接控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple connection between two controls. 该示例演示三种方式建立连接： 以声明方式，通过将连接标记放置在 Web 页在标记中以编程方式，通过在代码; 中创建连接并通过用户界面，通过将放置控件在页上，使用户能够建立的连接。The example demonstrates three ways of forming a connection: declaratively, by placing tags for the connection in the markup of the Web page; programmatically, by creating the connection in code; and through the UI, by placing a control on the page, which enables users to establish a connection. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为接口和控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 源代码文件包含一个简单的接口名为`IZipCode`。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 此外，还有类名为`ZipCodeWebPart`的实现接口，并充当提供者控件。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 其`ProvideIZipCode`方法是实现接口的唯一成员的回调方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 该方法只需返回接口的实例。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 请注意，该方法标记与`ConnectionProvider`其元数据中的属性。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 这是用于标识提供者连接点的回调方法作为该方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 另类命名为`WeatherWebPart`，并充当使用者的连接。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 此类有一个名为方法`GetZipCode`获取的实例`IZipCode`从提供者控件的接口。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 请注意，此方法标记为与使用者的连接点方法`ConnectionConsumer`其元数据中的属性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是`Register`用户控件和自定义指令控件。Near the top are the `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls. 该示例假定动态编译的控件，因为控件的源代码应采用的 App_Code 子文件夹中;`Register`页中的标记引用仅任意标记前缀和控件的命名空间。Because the example assumes dynamic compilation of the controls, the source code for the controls should be in an App_Code subfolder; the `Register` tag in the page references only an arbitrary tag prefix and the namespace of the controls. 自定义控件 （提供程序和使用者） 声明 Web 页内``元素中，内部``元素。The custom controls (the provider and consumer) are declared within the Web page's `` element, inside a `` element. 页提供了三种方式自定义控件之间的连接。The page provides three ways to form a connection between the custom controls. 第一种方法是声明性。The first method is declarative. 页上，在标记中 <`StaticConnections>`元素声明，并在其中是``元素中，并且为属性指定的连接的各种使用者和提供程序详细信息。In the markup for the page, a <`StaticConnections>` element is declared, and within that is an `` element, with the various consumer and provider details of the connection specified as attributes. 这是一种方法创建的连接，具体而言是在直接在 Web 页中，声明``元素。This is one way to create a connection, by declaring it directly in the Web page, specifically within the `` element. 由于此静态连接，立即在页面加载的第一次创建两个自定义控件之间的连接。Because of this static connection, a connection between the two custom controls is created immediately the first time the page loads. 构成控件之间的连接的第二个方法提供的``页中的元素。A second method for forming a connection between the controls is provided by the `` element in the page. 如果用户在运行时，将页切换为连接显示模式，并单击其中一个自定义控件上的连接谓词``元素自动呈现的 UI 创建的连接。If a user switches a page into connect display mode at run time, and clicks a connect verb on one of the custom controls, the `` element automatically renders the UI for creating a connection. 该页还演示了创建的连接，这是以编程方式执行第三种的方法。The page also demonstrates a third way of creating a connection, which is to do it programmatically. 在中`Button1_Click`方法，该代码会创建的对象提供程序控件，并检索其连接点的详细信息通过调用方法。In the `Button1_Click` method, the code creates a object for the provider control, and retrieves its connection point details by calling the method. 其执行的使用者控件类似的任务调用方法。It carries out a similar task for the consumer control, calling the method. 最后，它会创建新对象通过调用方法控件。Finally, it creates the new object by calling the method on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载 Web 页在浏览器中后，第一个连接已存在的原因内声明了``元素。After you load the Web page in a browser, the first connection already exists because it is declared within the `` element. 输入中的某些文本**ZIP 代码提供程序**控件使用，而且将在使用者控件中显示。Enter some text in the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and it will be displayed in the consumer control. 接下来，断开连接的两个控件。Next, disconnect the two controls. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件中，更改页后，可以连接显示模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to connect display mode. 单击 （标题栏中的向下箭头表示） 的谓词菜单的每个控件，并请注意，每个都**Connect**选项。Click the verbs menu (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar) for each of the controls, and notice that each has a **Connect** option. 这是连接动词的谓词菜单中显示页面时才在连接模式下。This is a connect verb, which appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in connect mode. 单击其中一个控件，并连接所提供的用户界面上连接谓词显示控件。Click the connect verb on one of the controls, and the connection UI provided by the control appears. 单击**断开连接**按钮结束控件之间的静态连接。Click the **Disconnect** button to end the static connection between the controls. 使用**显示模式**控件以返回页后，可以浏览模式。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 请尝试再次，在提供程序中输入一些新的文本，并记下控件断开连接，因为文本不能更新使用者控件中。Try to enter some new text in the provider again, and note that because the controls are disconnected, the text fails to update in the consumer control. 接下来，使用与上述相同的方法将页切换到连接显示模式。Next, use the same method as above to switch the page into connect display mode again. 单击其中一个控件上的连接谓词。Click a connect verb on one of the controls. 单击**创建的连接**链接，并使用提供的用户界面控件创建控件之间的连接。Click the **Create a Connection** link, and use the UI provided by the control to create a connection between the controls. 这是用于创建连接的第二个方法。This is the second method for creating a connection. 请注意，一旦建立连接，最后一个字符串中输入的提供程序控件 （未显示，因为控件已断开连接） 会立即出现在使用者，因为已重新创建连接。Note that as soon as the connection is formed, the last string you entered in the provider control (that failed to appear because the controls were disconnected) suddenly appears in the consumer, because the connection has been recreated. 单击**断开连接**按钮来终止您刚创建的当前连接。Click the **Disconnect** button to end the current connection that you just created. 返回页后，可以浏览模式。Return the page to browse mode. 要演示的文本不会更新，以及控件再次断开连接的提供程序中输入一些新的文本。Enter some new text in the provider to demonstrate that the text is not updated, and that the controls are again disconnected. 返回页后，可以连接显示模式。Return the page to connect display mode. 而不是单击连接谓词，单击**连接 web 部件控件**按钮，说明了建立连接的第三个方法。Instead of clicking a connect verb, click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, which illustrates the third method of forming a connection. 这种方法连接控件以编程方式在一个简单的步骤中，而无需使用控件。This approach connects the controls programmatically in one simple step without having to use the control. 请注意，当创建连接后，您突然输入提供程序中的最后一个字符串将显示在使用者控件。Note that as the connection is created, the last string you entered in the provider suddenly appears in the consumer control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是公共的因此 ASP.NET 分析器可以创建实例，当在 Web 页的标记中声明一个连接; 此构造函数不应在开发人员代码中使用。The constructor is public so that the ASP.NET parser can create an instance when a connection is declared in the markup of a Web page; this constructor is not intended to be used in developer code. 如果想要创建对象以编程方式，应使用或方法中提供控件。When you want to create a object programmatically, you should use the or the method provided in the control. 这些方法处理的许多详细信息创建连接，并返回对象。These methods handle the many details of creating a connection, and return a object. 构造函数类设置的值并属性设置为`true`。The constructor for the class sets the values of the and properties to `true`. 因此，新的连接的默认状态是静态的 （这意味着在对包含网页的标记中声明） 和共享 （页上的所有用户可见）。Thus the default state of a new connection is to be static (meaning that it is declared in the markup of the containing Web page) and shared (visible to all users of the page). 通过声明的标记中的页的连接，在典型的方案中，添加连接时，会遇到这种情况``元素。This will be the case when you add a connection in the typical scenario, by declaring the connection in the markup of the page with an `` element. 但是，在其他情况下连接将具有这些属性的不同值。However, in other circumstances a connection will have different values for these properties. 例如，当您添加的连接以编程方式在代码中，创建连接对象以及用户在默认用户个性化设置范围中查看页面，则连接创建为动态的每个 user(visible only to the specific user)连接。For example, when you add a connection programmatically by creating the connection object in code, and the user is viewing the page in the default user personalization scope, the connection is created as a dynamic, per-user(visible only to the specific user) connection. > [!NOTE] > 并属性是只读的并会在内部设置这些属性用于确定连接的性质控件，具体取决于如何创建的连接 (以声明方式在页标记中，或以编程方式通过代码或用户界面）。The and properties are read-only, and these properties that determine the nature of a connection are set internally by the control depending on how a connection is created (declaratively in the page markup, or programmatically through your code or the user interface).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Consumer As WebPart

summary.span: 获取一个作为连接中的使用者控件的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that is acting as the consumer control in a connection.

value.span: 一个 ，表示作为连接中的使用者的 Web 部件控件。

span.span: A that represents the Web Parts control acting as the consumer in a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Web 部件连接包含共享数据的两个控件。Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls that share data. 一个控件充当数据的提供程序和其他控件充当使用者接收和处理从提供程序的数据。One control acts as the provider of data, and the other control acts as a consumer, receiving and processing the data from the provider. 属性获取对控件的控件作为连接关系中的使用者。The property gets a reference to the control acting as a consumer in a connection relationship. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将属性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为两个源代码充当使用者和提供程序连接，以及用于连接点的接口的控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三个部分是 Web 页面承载的控件，并演示如何使用代码属性。The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the property. 页面顶部附近是`Register`用于用户控件和自定义控件。Near the top of the page are the `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls. 因为此示例使用动态编译`Register`指令的源文件不需要引用程序集名称，其中包括仅任意标记前缀和控件的命名空间。Because this example uses dynamic compilation, the `Register` directive for the source file does not need to reference an assembly name; it includes only an arbitrary tag prefix and the namespace of the controls. 在中`Button2_Click`方法中，代码访问通过连接对象控件，并获取对使用者控件的引用。In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the connection object through the control, and gets a reference to the consumer control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，使用**显示模式**要切换页可连接模式下的下拉列表控件。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 单击 （标题栏中的向下箭头表示） 之一上的谓词菜单控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 使用**连接 web 部件控件**按钮或提供的连接用户界面 (UI) 中，创建两个控件之间的连接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection user interface (UI), to create a connection between the two controls. 单击**显示使用者信息**按钮以运行代码，演示属性。Click the **Display Consumer Info** button to run the code that demonstrates the property.

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象作为连接中充当使用者的控件的连接点。

span.span: Gets the object that serves as a connection point for a control that is acting as a consumer in a connection.

value.span: 与连接中的使用者控件关联的 。

span.span: A associated with the consumer control in a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于创建两个连接所需的步骤之一控件是创建每个控件的连接点。One of the required steps for creating a connection between two controls is to create connection points for each control. 使用者连接点是包含有关如何连接到作为使用者的控件的信息的对象。The consumer connection point is an object that contains the information about how to connect to the control acting as a consumer. 在使用者的源代码，一种方法必须标识与`ConnectionConsumer`属性。In the consumer's source code, one of the methods must be identified with the `ConnectionConsumer` attribute. 与使用者控件关联的对象包含有关方法和属性，包括对于方法，以便在用户界面 (UI) 中使用的显示名称的 ID 的详细信息，何种类型的接口方法可以检索。The object that is associated with a consumer control contains details about the method and the attribute, including an ID for the method, a display name for use in the user interface (UI), and what type of interface the method can retrieve. 这套有关使用者的信息、 用于形成连接和理解，接口的类型及其方法共同形成了使用者连接点。This set of information about the consumer, its method for forming connections, and the type of interface it understands, collectively forms a consumer connection point. 默认情况下对象可以连接到仅一个对象一次。By default, a object can connect to only one object at a time. 使用者可能有多个方法标识为可能的使用者连接点，但使用者只能参与一个是作为使用者连接 （因此，仅其中一个其使用者连接点可以处于活动状态） 一次。A consumer could have multiple methods identified as possible consumer connection points, but a consumer can only participate in one connection as a consumer (hence, only one of its consumer connection points can be active) at a time. 与此相反，可以连接到任意数量的对象。In contrast, a can connect to any number of objects. 可以通过替代来更改此默认行为属性上的属性。This default behavior can be changed by overriding the property on the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将属性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为两个源代码充当使用者和提供程序连接，以及用于连接点的接口的控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三个部分是 Web 页面承载的控件，并演示如何使用代码属性。The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the property. 在中`Button1_Click`方法，以形成连接所需的所有对象都创建，其中包括对象。In the `Button1_Click` method, all the objects required to form a connection are created, including a object. 这些对象将传递给方法以创建连接。These objects are all passed to the method to create the connection. 在中`Button2_Click`方法中，代码访问属性并显示点的连接的一些详细信息。In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property and displays some details of the connection point. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，使用**显示模式**要切换页可连接模式下的下拉列表控件。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 单击 （标题栏中的向下箭头表示） 之一上的谓词菜单控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 使用**连接 web 部件控件**按钮或提供的连接用户界面，以创建两个控件之间的连接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection UI, to create a connection between the two controls. 单击**连接点的详细信息**按钮以运行代码，演示属性。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that demonstrates the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置连接上的属性值，该值引用作为该连接的使用者连接点的对象的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the object serving as the consumer connection point for that connection.

value.span: 包含使用者连接点的 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于在 Web 页的标记中声明静态连接，开发人员可以指定哪些使用者连接点将用于通过将分配到的值连接`ConsumerConnectionPointID`特性，可以在``元素。For a static connection declared in the markup of a Web page, developers can specify which consumer connection point will be used for the connection by assigning a value to the `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute on the `` element. 如果不将值分配给该属性，使用属性值。If a value is not assigned to the attribute, the property value is used. 在创建动态 （以编程方式） 连接时，通常您不应设置的值属性。When you create dynamic (programmatic) connections, normally you should not set the value of the property. 您可以简单地调用方法控件，将其传递给使用者和使用者连接点 （以及其他必需的参数），对象和该方法将确定要使用使用者的连接的正确 ID点。You can simply call the method on the control, passing to it the consumer and consumer connection point objects (along with the other required parameters), and that method determines the correct ID to use for the consumer's connection point. 同样，断开连接后，您可以调用方法，而无需指定属性值。Similarly, when you disconnect, you can call the method without needing to specify the property value. > [!NOTE] > 当你指定时，可确定使用者连接点的 ID或其他服务器控件作为使用者。The ID of a consumer's connection point can be determined when you designate a or other server control as a consumer. 必须确定检索的提供者控件或转换器提供的接口的实例的使用者中的方法。You must identify a method in the consumer that retrieves an instance of an interface furnished by either a provider control or a transformer. 若要标识的方法，将其与标记`ConnectionConsumer`code 属性。To identify the method, mark it with the `ConnectionConsumer` code attribute. 当添加此属性时，可以添加一个可选的字符串值参数，充当使用者的 ID对象。When you add this attribute, you can add an optional string value parameter that serves as an ID for the consumer's object. 如果提供可选的 ID 参数的值，该值将成为的值连接属性。If you supply a value for the optional ID parameter, that value becomes the value of the property for the connection. 如果未提供 ID 值，使用属性值。If you do not supply an ID value, the property value is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用属性。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为接口和使用者和提供程序控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意，在页标记中，声明一个连接使用``和``元素。Note that a connection is declared in the page markup, using the `` and `` elements. 连接声明包含所需`ConsumerConnectionPointID`属性。The connection declaration includes the required `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute. 创建连接的第二个方法将出现在`Button1_Click`方法，该代码在其中创建新的连接，使用使用者控件中定义的连接点。A second method for creating the connection appears in the `Button1_Click` method, where the code creates a new connection, using the connection point defined in the consumer control. 然后，在`Button2_Click`方法中，代码访问属性。Then, in the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property. summary.span: 获取或设置连接上的属性值，该值引用作为该连接的使用者的 控件的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the control acting as a consumer for that connection.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含作为连接中的使用者的控件的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control acting as a consumer in a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值是必需的当创建之间的连接时控件。The property value is required when you create a connection between controls. 如果值未分配给该属性，将引发异常时控件尝试激活连接。If a value is not assigned to the property, an exception is thrown when the control attempts to activate the connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用属性。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerID#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerID/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerID#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerID/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为接口和使用者和提供程序控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 对象当前是否已经建立并且能够在其提供者和使用者控件之间交换数据。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a object is currently established and able to exchange data between its provider and consumer controls.

value.span: 如果连接处于活动状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection is active; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示的状态对象。The property indicates a state of a object. 当连接处于此状态时，在连接中的提供程序和使用者控件进行通信，并且能够通过公共接口的数据交换或对象。When the connection is in this state, the provider and consumer controls in the connection are communicating and able to exchange data through a common interface or a object. 当用户查看呈现的页面在正常浏览模式中包含已建立的连接时，连接通常是活动 （除非它无法加载页面时激活由于某些冲突或其他问题）。When a user views a rendered page that includes an established connection in normal browse mode, the connection is typically active (unless it failed to be activated due to some conflict or other issue when the page loaded). 在页面和控件生命周期的早期阶段，属性值是`false`。In the early stages of the page and control life cycle, the property value is `false`. 该连接后将激活上的事件引发控件。The connection is activated just after the event on the control is raised. 具体而言，该连接将激活后使用者是否已从提供程序检索指定接口的实例或对象。Specifically, the connection is activated after the consumer has retrieved an instance of the specified interface from the provider or a object. 最好先了解连接是否处于活动状态的情况下可能存在冲突或由于页上的多个连接的同步问题。It is useful to know whether a connection is active in situations where there might be conflicts or synchronization issues due to multiple connections on a page. 例如，如果没有某种类型的两个连接之间的冲突控件具有未激活的多个连接的选项，以避免冲突。For example, if there is some kind of conflict between two connections, the control has the option of not activating one of the connections to avoid the conflict. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 该示例包含三个部分：The example has three parts: - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 代码示例的第一部分是接口，并且使用者和提供程序控件的源代码。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). remarks.format: ## Remarks 与单个一样控件，对象可以是共享或每个用户实例。As with individual controls, a object can be a shared or a per-user instance. 共享的实例表示的连接是可见的网页，所有用户的每个用户实例表示的连接是仅对特定用户可见。A shared instance means that the connection is visible to all users of a Web page, and a per-user instance means the connection is visible only to a specific user. 一般情况下，将连接添加到页面的方式确定是否共享此连接。In general, the way a connection is added to a page determines whether the connection is shared. 如果在 Web 页面的标记中声明连接，则共享此连接并属性值是`true`。If the connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, then the connection is shared and the property value is `true`. 此外，如果 Web 页处于共享个性化设置范围内，添加一个连接时，连接也会共享。In addition, if the Web page is in shared personalization scope when a connection is added, the connection is also shared. 通常情况下，当用户使用``用户界面 (UI) 来添加连接时，页面是在用户个性化设置范围内，因此不共享此连接并属性值是`false`。Typically, when a user uses the `` user interface (UI) to add a connection, the page is in user personalization scope, so the connection is not shared and the property value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 代码示例包含五个部分：The code example has five parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 若要运行示例所需的 Web.config 文件中的条目。An entry in the Web.config file that is required to run the example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为接口和使用者和提供程序控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] example to be able to edit the page in shared personalization scope. 若要启用此功能，必须具有一个条目中的 Web.config 文件内``部分如以下示例所示。To enable this, you must have an entry in the Web.config file within the `` section that looks like the following example. ``` ``` 加载浏览器中的页面后，使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件切换页后，可以连接显示模式。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect display mode. 单击**连接 web 部件控件**按钮以形成连接。Click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to form a connection. 接下来，单击**连接详细信息**按钮以显示是否共享此连接。Next, click the **Connection Details** button to display whether the connection is shared. 如果使用的页中的默认用户个性化设置范围，创建连接属性值应为`false`连接。If you created the connection with the page in the default user personalization scope, the property value should be `false` for the connection. 其中一个的谓词菜单上控件 （由标题栏中的向下箭头指示），单击连接谓词。On the verbs menu of one of the controls (indicated by the downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb. 连接用户界面出现时，单击**断开连接**按钮终止连接。When the connection UI appears, click the **Disconnect** button to end the connection. 使用**显示模式**控件以返回页后，可以浏览模式。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 在中**显示模式**控件中，选择**共享**选项切换到页共享个性化设置范围。In the **Display Mode** control, select the **Shared** option to switch the page into shared personalization scope. 按照相同的步骤与创建的连接，并再次单击这些上面**连接详细信息**按钮以显示是否共享此连接。Follow the same steps as those above to create a connection, and again click the **Connection Details** button to display whether the connection is shared. 在本示例中的值属性应为`true`。In this case, the value of the property should be `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件之间的连接可以是静态或动态。Connections between Web Parts controls can be either static or dynamic. 在 Web 页面的标记中声明静态连接使用``元素。A static connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, using an `` element. 以编程方式创建动态连接或当用户创建的连接通过用户界面 (UI) 由定义控件。Dynamic connections are created programmatically or when a user creates a connection through the user interface (UI) defined by the control. 静态连接是共享的对象，这意味着它们可供 Web 页的所有用户。Static connections are shared objects, meaning they are available to all users of the Web page. 此外，它们是永久实质上是因为，喜欢静态控件，它们不能被永久删除。Also, they are essentially permanent because, like a static control, they cannot be permanently deleted. > [!NOTE] > 虽然不能永久删除静态连接对象，它可以被永久断开。While a static connection object cannot be permanently deleted, it can be permanently disconnected. 在这种情况下，断开连接的对象将存在的服务器上，但最终用户将永远不会知道在页面中的对象存在。In this case, the disconnected object would exist on the server, but an end user would never be aware of the object's existence in a page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将属性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要承载控件和运行代码示例网页。A Web page to host the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 代码示例的第一部分是接口，并且使用者和提供程序控件的源代码。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是`Register`指的是两个动态编译的源代码的指令控件。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 中声明静态连接``页上的元素。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. `Button1_Click`方法访问要检查连接是否为静态属性。The `Button1_Click` method accesses the property to check whether the connection is static. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/CS/wpConnectIsStaticCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/VB/wpConnectIsStaticVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 已创建静态连接。The static connection is already created. 在提供程序控件中，输入一些文本，并记下的使用者控件中的显示文本。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control. 单击**连接详细信息**按钮以显示的值属性。Click the **Connection Details** button to display the value of the property.

A that acts as the provider of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Web 部件连接中包含两个控件-使用者和提供程序--和属性返回在连接中对提供程序控件的引用。Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls--a consumer and a provider--and the property returns a reference to the provider control in a connection. 等连接 （使用者控件） 中其对应的提供者控件需要建立连接。Like its counterpart in a connection (the consumer control), the provider control is required to establish a connection. 是否以编程方式或通过声明以页持久性格式创建的连接，必须指定控件充当用于连接的提供程序。Whether you create the connection programmatically, or by declaring it in page persistence format, you must specify a control to act as the provider for a connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要承载控件和运行代码示例网页。A Web page to host the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 代码示例的第一部分是接口，并且使用者和提供程序控件的源代码。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是`Register`指的是两个动态编译的源代码的指令控件。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 中声明静态连接``页上的元素。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. 请注意，在``元素，`ProviderID`属性具有分配给它的提供者控件的 ID。Notice that in the `` element, the `ProviderID` attribute has the ID of the provider control assigned to it. 这是标识用于静态连接的提供程序所需的。This is required to identify the provider for the static connection. `Button1_Click`方法访问属性并将一些其详细信息写入到一个标签。The `Button1_Click` method accesses the property and writes some of its details to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/CS/wpConnectProviderCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/VB/wpConnectProviderVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 已创建静态连接。The static connection is already created. 在提供程序控件中，输入一些文本，并记下的使用者控件中的显示文本。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control. 单击**提供程序详细信息**按钮以显示通过访问的属性值的一些属性。Click the **Provider Details** button to display some of the property values accessed through the property.

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象作为充当连接提供者的 控件的连接点。

span.span: Gets the object that serves as a connection point for a control acting as a provider for a connection.

value.span: 与连接中的提供者控件关联的 。

span.span: A associated with the provider control in a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于创建两个连接所需的步骤之一控件是创建每个控件的连接点。One of the required steps for creating a connection between two controls is to create connection points for each control. 提供者连接点是包含有关如何连接到作为一个提供程序的控件的信息的对象。The provider connection point is an object that contains the information about how to connect to the control acting as a provider. 在提供程序的源代码，一种方法必须标识与`ConnectionProvider`属性。In the provider's source code, one of the methods must be identified with the `ConnectionProvider` attribute. ，它是关联控件与提供程序包含有关方法和属性，包括对于方法，以便在用户界面 (UI) 中使用的显示名称的 ID 的详细信息，何种类型的接口实例方法可以返回到使用者控件。The that is associated with a provider control contains details about the method and the attribute, including an ID for the method, a display name for use in the user interface (UI), and what type of interface instance the method can return to a consumer control. 此提供程序有关的信息、 用于形成连接和它提供的接口的类型及其方法的共同形成提供者连接点。This set of information about the provider, its method for forming connections, and the type of interface it provides, collectively forms a provider connection point. 默认情况下可以连接到仅一个对象一次。By default, a can connect to only one object at a time. 使用者可能有多个方法标识为可能的使用者连接点，但使用者只能参与一个是作为使用者连接 （因此，仅其中一个其使用者连接点可以处于活动状态） 一次。A consumer could have multiple methods identified as possible consumer connection points, but a consumer can only participate in one connection as a consumer (hence, only one of its consumer connection points can be active) at a time. 与此相反，可以连接到任意数量的默认情况下的对象。In contrast, a can connect to any number of objects by default. 例如，提供邮政编码的提供程序控件无法连接到邮政代码用于创建各种类型的数据基于邮政编码，例如天气数据、 新闻等的多个使用者控件。For example, a provider control that provides a postal code could be connected to multiple consumer controls that use a postal code to create various kinds of data based on a postal code, such as weather data, news, and so on. 可以通过替代来更改此默认行为属性上的属性。This default behavior can be changed by overriding the property on the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将属性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为两个源代码充当使用者和提供程序连接，以及用于连接点的接口的控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三个部分是 Web 页面承载的控件，并演示如何使用代码属性。The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the property. 在中`Button1_Click`方法，以形成连接所需的所有对象都创建，其中包括对象。In the `Button1_Click` method, all the objects required to form a connection are created, including a object. 请注意在调用方法控件。Note the call to the method on the control. 创建的对象将传递给方法以创建连接。The various created objects are all passed to the method to create the connection. 在中`Button2_Click`方法中，代码访问属性并显示点的连接的一些详细信息。In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property and displays some details of the connection point. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，使用**显示模式**要切换页可连接模式下的下拉列表控件。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 单击 （标题栏中的向下箭头表示） 之一上的谓词菜单控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 使用**连接 web 部件控件**按钮或提供的连接用户界面，以创建两个控件之间的连接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection UI, to create a connection between the two controls. 单击**连接点的详细信息**按钮以运行代码，演示属性。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that demonstrates the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置连接上的属性值，该值引用作为该连接的提供者连接点的对象的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the object serving as the provider connection point for that connection.

value.span: 包含提供者连接点对象的 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID for a provider connection point object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于在 Web 页的标记中声明静态连接，开发人员可以指定的提供者连接点将用于通过将分配到的值连接`ProviderConnectionPointID`特性，可以在``元素。For a static connection declared in the markup of a Web page, developers can specify which provider connection point will be used for the connection by assigning a value to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute on the `` element. 如果不将值分配给该属性，使用属性值。If a value is not assigned to the attribute, the property value is used. 在创建动态 （以编程方式） 连接时，通常您不应设置的值属性。When you create dynamic (programmatic) connections, normally you should not set the value of the property. 您可以简单地调用方法控件，将其传递给提供程序和提供程序连接点对象 （以及其他必需的参数），而该方法将确定要使用的提供程序的连接的正确 ID点。You can simply call the method on the control, passing to it the provider and provider connection point objects (along with the other required parameters), and that method determines the correct ID to use for the provider's connection point. 同样，断开连接后，您可以调用方法，而无需指定属性值。Similarly, when you disconnect, you can call the method without needing to specify the property value. > [!NOTE] > 当你指定时，可确定的提供者连接点 ID或其他服务器控件作为提供程序。The ID of a provider's connection point can be determined when you designate a or other server control as a provider. 您必须标识中提供的包含数据的使用者的接口实例的提供程序的回调方法。You must identify a callback method in the provider that serves an instance of an interface containing data to a consumer. 若要标识的方法，将其与标记`ConnectionProvider`code 属性。To identify the method, mark it with the `ConnectionProvider` code attribute. 当添加此属性时，可以添加一个可选的字符串值参数，可提供程序的 ID 作为对象。When you add this attribute, you can add an optional string value parameter that serves as an ID for the provider's object. 如果提供可选的 ID 参数的值，该值将成为的值连接属性。If you supply a value for the optional ID parameter, that value becomes the value of the property for the connection. 如果未提供 ID 值，创建对象时，控制会分配一个默认 ID。If you do not supply an ID value, the control assigns a default ID when the object is created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用属性。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为接口和使用者和提供程序控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意，在页标记中，声明一个连接使用``和``元素。Note that a connection is declared in the page markup, using the `` and `` elements. 连接声明包含所需`ProviderConnectionPointID`属性。The connection declaration includes the required `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute. 创建连接的第二个方法将出现在`Button1_Click`方法，其中代码将创建一个新的连接使用的连接点 （和 ID） 中定义的提供者控件。A second method for creating the connection appears in the `Button1_Click` method, where the code creates a new connection, using the connection point (and the ID) defined in the provider control. 然后，在`Button2_Click`方法中，代码访问属性。Then, in the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，连接已存在由于页面中声明静态连接。After you load the page in a browser, a connection already exists because of the static connection declared in the page. 在提供程序控件中，输入一些文本，并记下它会显示在该连接由于使用者。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection. 接下来，断开的控件。Next, disconnect the controls. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件中，切换页可连接模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, switch the page to connect mode. 单击 （标题栏中的向下箭头表示） 之一上的谓词菜单控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 单击**断开连接**按钮。Click the **Disconnect** button. 使用**连接 web 部件控件**按钮以重新创建两个控件之间的连接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls. 单击**连接点的详细信息**按钮以运行访问的代码属性值。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that accesses the property value. 值标签控件的下方中写出。The value is written out in a label below the controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值是必需的当您创建两个连接控件。The property value is required when you create a connection between two controls. 如果值未分配给该属性，将引发异常时控件尝试激活连接。If a value is not assigned to the property, an exception is thrown when the control attempts to activate the connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用属性。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要托管的所有控件和运行的代码示例网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，连接已存在由于页面中声明静态连接。After you load the page in a browser, a connection already exists because of the static connection declared in the page. 在提供程序控件中，输入一些文本，并记下它会显示在该连接由于使用者。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection. 接下来，断开的控件。Next, disconnect the controls. 若要执行此操作，请使用**显示模式**要切换页可连接模式下的下拉列表控件。To do that, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 单击 （标题栏中的向下箭头表示） 之一上的谓词菜单控件，并单击连接谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 单击**断开连接**按钮和控件断开连接。Click the **Disconnect** button, and the controls are disconnected. 接下来，使用**连接 web 部件控件**按钮以重新创建两个控件之间的连接。Next, use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls. 单击**使用者的详细信息**按钮以运行访问的代码属性值。Click the **Consumer Details** button to run the code that accesses the property value.

summary.span: 重写继承的 方法，并返回连接对象的类型的简称。
