span.span: A string that contains the short (unqualified) type name of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计主要是为方便起见使用此方法。This method is used mostly for convenience by control designers. 它可以提高连接对象的显示方式在设计视图中使用较短类型名称，而不是完全限定的类型名称。It improves how connection objects appear in Design view by using the shorter type name, as opposed to a fully qualified type name. 但是，可以调用方法在代码中的任何时候你想要知道连接对象的类型名称。However, the method can be called at any point in your code where you want to know the type name of a connection object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法返回的短类型名称对象。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to return the short type name of a object. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 若要承载控件和运行代码示例网页。A Web page to host the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 代码示例的第一部分是接口，并且使用者和提供程序控件的源代码。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是`Register`指的是两个动态编译的源代码的指令控件。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 中声明静态连接``页上的元素。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. `Button1_Click`方法调用方法将连接的类型名称写入一个标签。The `Button1_Click` method calls the method to write the type name of the connection to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/CS/wpConnectToStringCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/VB/wpConnectToStringVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 已创建静态连接。The static connection is already created. 在提供程序控件中，输入一些文本，并记下的使用者控件中的显示文本。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control. 单击**连接详细信息**按钮以执行方法。Click the **Connection Details** button to execute the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Transformer As WebPartTransformer

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，用于在 Web 部件连接中两个不兼容的连接点之间转换数据。

span.span: Gets a object that is used to transform data between two otherwise incompatible connection points in a Web Parts connection.
A .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件连接中，有两种方法可以连接在连接中的提供程序和使用者控件。In a Web Parts connection, there are two ways in which the provider and consumer controls in the connection can connect. 可以建立直接连接，通过其各自对象和理解的这两个控件的接口类型。They can connect directly, through their respective objects and an interface type that is understood by both controls. 或者，如果它们是不兼容，它们可以直接连接，使用将来自提供程序接口实例转换为使用者所理解的类型的对象。Or, if they are incompatible, they can connect indirectly, using a object that transforms an interface instance from a provider into a type understood by a consumer. 转换器需要作为连接的一部分时属性提供对引用对象。When a transformer is needed as part of a connection, the property provides a reference to the object. 可以通过添加自定义转换器 （或其中一个 Web 部件控件集提供转换器） 的标记添加的网页，以声明方式在标记中的连接的转换器内,``元素。You can add a transformer for a connection declaratively in the markup of a Web page, by adding a tag for a custom transformer (or one of the transformers provided with the Web Parts control set) within the `` element. 您还可以添加转换器，以编程方式在代码中，创建它的一个实例并调用方法控件创建的连接，并向它传递转换器对象以及其他必需的参数。You can also add a transformer programmatically, creating an instance of it in your code, and calling the method on the control to create the connection, passing to it the transformer object along with the other required parameters.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Transformers As WebPartTransformerCollection

summary.span: 获取由 Web 部件控件集内部使用的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects used internally by the Web Parts control set.
A containing objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性永远不会由开发人员应使用。The property is never intended for use by developers. 若要访问连接相关联的转换器，开发人员应始终使用属性。To access the transformer associated with a connection, developers should always use the property. 属性在内部由 Web 部件控件集用来使页面开发人员内声明转换器元素``Web 页的标记中的元素。The property is used internally by the Web Parts control set to enable page developers to declare transformer elements within the `` element in the markup of a Web page.
